Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Largest office property in Canada east of Montreal, Maritime Centre is ideally situated in the middle of all Halifax’s downtown amenities. Newly built retail space with prime visibility facing Spring Garden Road, Halifax’s major commercial and cultural hub. This is a unique opportunity to be situated in the heart of the action. See the marketing package for more details!

Located on Barrington Street, the Green Lantern Building is distinctly located in the heart of downtown Halifax’s shopping and entertainment district. Local area attractions include the Halifax Waterfront, the newly constructed Nova Centre and refurbished Argyle Street, the Scotiabank Centre, the Spring Garden Road Shopping District and the new Halifax Public Library, the Provincial Law Courts and Dalhousie University. Retailers nearby include Starbucks, Lululemon, Shoppers Drug Mart, the NSLC, major financial institutions and a range of national and local retailers and restaurants. See the Information Package for more details!
See the Information Package for more details!
See the Information Package for more details!

1595 Barrington Street is distinctly located in the heart ofdowntown Halifax’s shopping and entertainment district. Local area attractions include the Halifax Waterfront, the newlyconstructed Nova Centre and refurbished Argyle Street, theScotiabank Centre, the Spring Garden Road Shopping Districtand the new Halifax Public Library, the Provincial Law Courtsand Dalhousie University. Retailers nearby include Starbucks,Lululemon, Shoppers Drug Mart, the NSLC, major financialinstitutions and a range of national and local retailers andrestaurants. See the Information Package for more details!

High profile downtown location situated across from the new convention centre. Commercial units have high ceilings, original brick walls, wooden beams, and maintained facade. Walking distance to the base of Citadel Hill, the waterfront, Spring Garden Road, the new public library, as well as many of Halifax’s iconic pubs, bars, and restaurants. Historic style windows which provide ample natural light . Ideal for cafes, restaurants & retail. $25.00 - $35.00 Net PSF.

High profile downtown location situated across from the new convention centre. Commercial units have high ceilings, original brick walls, wooden beams, and maintained facade. Walking distance to the base of Citadel Hill, the waterfront, Spring Garden Road, the new public library, as well as many of Halifax’s iconic pubs, bars, and restaurants. Historic style windows which provide ample natural light . Ideal for cafes, restaurants & retail. $25.00 - $35.00 Net PSF.

Amazing location situated in the heart of Downtown Halifax in a building which combines preserved 1800’s architecture with a modern, floor to ceiling glassed tower. This location offers easy access to all of the downtown area amenities, where tenants will have the luxury of being able to walk to all major banks, cafes, restaurants or shopping on lunch breaks or after work. See the Information Package for more details!

The Doyle is central to the two main commercial nodes on the Halifax Peninsula; the Spring Garden Business District and Central Business District. The immediate area provides a fabulous mix of multi-residential, office, retail and hotel developments as well as the City’s main hospitals, Dalhousie and Saint Mary’s University. Nearby attractions include the iconic Citadel Hill, Halifax Public Library and Public Gardens which add to the already high foot traffic this area experiences.

Prime ground floor retail space with excellent visibility and frontage on Spring Garden Road and Queen Street. Ideal for cafes, cocktail bars, restaurants and retailers. With 1,450 sq. ft of space in the Rotunda, and an additional 750 sq. ft. of optional downstairs kitchen/storage space, the space available is flexible to meet tenant demands.
See the Information Package for more details!

More vibrancy and excitement is being brought to the Spring Garden Road area by the addition of the Brenton Suites. Located just steps from Spring Garden Road on Brenton Street, this stunning 17 storey mixed use development is bringing 161 units of high end apartments and ±10,000 sq. ft. of prime retail space. The immediate area presents a unique mix of multi-residential developments, the Lord Nelson hotel, a number of office and retail complexes as well as hospitals and universities. In close proximity are the Halifax Public Gardens and the Halifax Public Library; both iconic Halifax landmarks and tourist attractions. Along Spring Garden Road, there are a number of major financial institutions, the Park Lane mall, local and national retailers, pharmacies and health services, as well as a strong mix of restaurants and cafés. The Brenton Suites are within walking distance to the central business district which makes for excellent walkability to and from the core. See the Information Package for more details!

The Trillium is ideally located on high traffic and sought after South Park Street. Located just steps from the ever popular Spring Garden Road, the Trillium is positioned for success as it benefits from some of the highest foot traffic in the City, has major transit stops nearby and new multi-residential developments continue to bring more residents to the area. The immediate area presents a unique mix of multi-residential developments, the Lord Nelson hotel, a number of office and retail complexes as well as major hospitals and universities. In close proximity are the Halifax Public Gardens and the Halifax Public Library; both iconic Halifax landmarks and tourist attractions. Along Spring Garden Road, there are a number of major financial institutions, the Park Lane mall, local and national retailers, pharmacies and health services, as well as a strong mix of restaurants and cafés. The Trillium is within walking distance to the central business district which makes for excellent walkability to and from the core.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 4,100 sq. ft. restaurant/bar opportunity with a potential 1,000 sq. ft. patio on the water. Opportunity for 100-150 seats.

- High traffic area in a high growth community

- Immediate stretch of Herring Cove Rd includes national retailers such as: Canadian Tire, McDonalds, RBC and Sobey’s
Former medical clinic located on busy Herring Cove Road.  The offices are behind an existing new format Shoppers Drug Mart making it an ideal location for a medical practice.
See the information package for more details!

The Junction is central to it all and is easily accessed from all major nodes in the City. This new mixed use development shines on the North End of Barrington Street and is situated just a short drive from the Windsor Street exchange, both bridges, downtown Halifax and the Hydrostone District. This building benefits from exceptional visibility along Barrington Street, a main thoroughfare flowing into and out of Downtown Halifax and also benefits from its positioning in one of Halifax’s highest demand areas; the North End. See the information package for more info!

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Richmond Yards, is the newest mixed use community currently under construction by Westwood Group, located in the heart of the Halifax Peninsula. Inspired by the vibrant community in the North End and Central Halifax, this neighbourhood will consist of residential, retail and commercial space. This walkable neighbourhood will be linked to bike lanes and public transit hubs and is designed for people to live, work and create.
Prime ground floor retail space with street frontage on Agricola Street. Ideal for cafes, retailers and restaurants. See the flyer for more details!

This property is the second phase of a recent development completed in early 2020 that includes high-end short-term residential rentals and is home to Obsolete Records and Port City Coffee on the ground floor. The property is located on one of the most popular commercial corridors in Halifax, in the revitalized and trendy “North End”. The site is just minutes from downtown Halifax, the Halifax Commons and the Hydrostone Market. The area has dramatically changed in the past 5 years with the opening of a number shops, critically acclaimed restaurants and cafés. This vibrant area is home to many new multi-residential developments including Point North, the Q-Lofts, Harris East and Monaghan Square. These developments have transformed the North End into a unique community and one of the most desirable areas of the city to live and work.
Prime ground floor retail space with street frontage on Agricola Street. Ideal for cafes, retailers and restaurants. See the flyer for more details!

Located in the heart of a beautiful Halifax Peninsula neighbourhood. Has the charm of a historic Halifax area, all the while there is high growth density within a short walk. In addition to street parking there is a large parking lot directly across the street. Easy access by carto all sections of Halifax/Dartmouth.
See the flyer for more!

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Clayton Park
Clayton Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located at 70 Lacewood Drive, this large format commercial opportunity is ideally positioned just minutes from Bayers Lake, Bedford and the Halifax Peninsula. Proximal to major highways, high traffic thoroughfares and the McKay Bridge, this location is easily accessed from all directions. This building offers exceptional signage opportunities and visibility on the Lacewood Drive as well as ample on-site parking for staff, clients and customers. Check out the flyer for more!

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Clayton Park
Clayton Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Open plan commercial space ideal for large footprint fitness concepts, retailers or office users. Demising options are available subject to concept, size and location. See flyer for more!

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: East side of Chain Lake Drive
East side of Chain Lake Drive

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The space is ideal for retailers, officer users, light industrial and storage. With 17,000 sq. ft. ground floor retail space, 5,950 sq. ft. of second floor office space, four 10x10 grade loading doors, and 24-27 foot clear ceiling heights. See the flyer for more details.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: East side of Chain Lake Drive
East side of Chain Lake Drive

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 127 Chain Lake Drive is ideally located in Bayers Lake, one of Halifax’s most prominent commercial nodes. This area is home to more than 300 businesses including many national retailers and brands, grocers, gas stations and restaurants; all of which benefit from the growing multi-residential communities nearby. Positioned just minutes from the Halifax Peninsula and the Port, easily accessed by transit and the 100 series highway, 127 Chain Lake Drive is a location you can’t miss.
